long_description: It can be hard to hide from the sun when you're high up on a rock face. The Outdoor Research Echolite cap fits underneath your climbing helmet and has a short brim to shade your eyes while you climb. Lightweight, breathable polyester fabric dries fast when you're working up a sweat. Short brim shades your eyes from the sun without blocking your vision while you're climbing. Polygiene(R) Active odor control technology made from silver salt helps keep odors away. Polyester headband wicks moisture off your brow. Outdoor Research Echolite cap has elastic in back for a comfortable fit.
short_description: It can be hard to hide from the sun when you're high up on a rock face. The Outdoor Research Echolite cap fits underneath your climbing helmet and has a short brim to shade your eyes while you climb.
